author: Aayush Yadav; Staff Writer
title: "He never behaves like a diva, which we have seen Cristiano Ronaldo do" - former Manchester United defender takes a dig at Cristiano Ronaldo - Sporticos
text: Manchester United's new signing, Rasmus Hojlund, has been making waves in the football world. Despite facing challenges and receiving less than adequate support from his teammates, he has managed to maintain a cool demeanor on the pitch. This article delves into Paul Parker's bold claim about this rising star and how he compares to Cristiano Ronaldo. Former [Manchester United defender](https://sporticos.com/en-gb/team/england/manchester-united-fc) Paul Parker recently made a bold statement about Hojlund. According to him, despite not getting enough support from his teammates, Hojlund doesn't react with frustration like Ronaldo during his second stint at Old Trafford. Instead of throwing tantrums like some players might do under such circumstances, Hojlund keeps a cool figure on the pitch. Former Manchester United defender, Paul Parker, said: “Everyone hates Manchester United and Rasmus Hojlund. Experts and critics hope that he fails because he plays for the world’s biggest club, which nobody likes. The good thing is that the fans have always supported him, and they will continue to do so." "I think he has been frustrated with his teammates because they don’t provide him with the best conditions to score goals, The good thing about Hojlund is that he doesn’t show it on the field, and he never behaves like a diva, which we have seen especially Cristiano Ronaldo do in the past." This is an important trait for any player in the high-pressure environment of professional football. It shows maturity and mental strength that can be crucial in tough matches where emotions run high. Parker also mentioned that people are hoping to see Hojlund struggle at Old Trafford - a common sentiment when new players join big clubs like Manchester United. However, instead of crumbling under pressure or reacting negatively towards these expectations, Rasmus seems aware of them and is determined to rise above them. As United's attack gels and Hojlund scores his first goal, big things are in the works Rasmus finally opened his account in the Premier League by scoring the winning goal in Manchester United's 3-2 comeback victory in the [Aston Villa fixture](https://sporticos.com/en-gb/team/england/aston-villa-fc) on December 26th. This performance not only showcased his skills as a striker but also demonstrated his ability to perform under pressure. Paul Parker believes that expectations will be higher for this young striker going forward after such an impressive performance. But if we consider how he has handled himself so far - keeping calm amidst challenges and delivering results when it matters most - it seems likely that Rasmus will continue impressing both fans and critics alike. Rasmus Hojlund is proving to be a valuable addition to Manchester United. His cool demeanour on the pitch, ability to handle pressure, and knack for scoring crucial goals are traits that make him stand out. As he continues his journey at Old Trafford, it will be interesting to see how he handles the increasing expectations and whether he can continue his impressive form in upcoming [Premier League matches](https://sporticos.com/en-gb/league/england/premier-league). For now, though, it seems like Manchester United has found a new star in Rasmus Hojlund.

author: Business Wire
title: Defense Derby’s January Update Brings New Blacksmith Unit
text:
RisingWings, a creative studio of KRAFTON, Inc., released its January update for the popular real-time PvP tower defense mobile game, Defense Derby .
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20231228541981/en/
Defense Derby reveals the Blacksmith unit on the January update (Graphic: KRAFTON, Inc.)
This update brings in the Blacksmith, a new physical-type human faction unit. Her unique ability, Forge, enhances the hero's attack power and speed. As a splash damage unit, the Blacksmith excels against groups of monsters and provides valuable support to heroes. Players can acquire the Blacksmith via the Shop of Blessings, Lucky Draw, Featured Summon, and Step Up Pack. The Derby Brawl - Blacksmith Mirror Match, featuring this new unit, is available until January 11.
January also marks the release of a new hero and the Radiant Start season. Lana, a magic-type hero from the human faction, has been introduced as the final hero to commemorate the 100-day anniversary of Defense Derby . Lana's abilities include summoning a damage-absorbing shield at a battle's start and the Divine Judgement skill, which targets the monster with the highest max HP. If the targeted monster is defeated, her skill's cooldown decreases. Lana will be granted as a legendary card to all players as of January 1.
Starting January 15, players can anticipate the debut of Electric Monk, a magic-type beast faction unit. Electric Monk's special ability, Electric Blast, creates a magnetic field on critical hits, affecting the surrounding area. The Derby Brawl - Electric Monk Mirror Match, available from January 15 to January 28, will showcase this new unit.
In the spirit of the winter season, a Christmas event is also available. Players can complete the missions to get all the puzzle pieces, then claim the final rewards of the puzzle such as the Christmas Castle Skin, Rare Unit Summon, and Crystals. The Christmas event will run until December 31.
For the latest Defense Derby updates, please visit https://www.facebook.com/DefenseDerby.THAILAND and follow along on social media (YouTube | Discord).
View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20231228541981/en/
KRAFTON
Jihyun Park
jihyun.park@krafton.com

author: ansa.it
title: Deputato brasiliano propone equivalenza tra aborto ed omicidio - Notizie - Ansa.it
text:
L'iniziativa di un deputato conservatore in Brasile rischia di portare il Paese a un grave passo indietro in materia di penalizzazione dell'aborto, equiparando l'interruzione volontaria della gravidanza oltre la 22esima settimana all'omicidio.
 Firmato dal deputato Sóstenes Cavalcante, un pastore evangelico candidatosi per il Partito Liberale di destra, il progetto è stato approvato con carattere d'urgenza e potrebbe essere già votato in una delle prossime sedute della Camera senza necessariamente passare per l'esame in sede di Commissione.
 Il testo prevede un consistente aumento della pena per le donne che intendono abortire e per i medici che acconsentano alla pratica oltre la 22ma settimana portando la pena massima dagli attuali 10 anni a 20, equiparandola appunto a quella dell'omicidio.
 Il Brasile è un paese prevalentemente cattolico e l'interruzione di gravidanza non è consentita salvo alcune eccezioni. Lo stesso governo progressista di Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva è reticente in materia di diritto all'aborto. Attualmente la pratica è depenalizzata solo in caso di feto affetto da anencefalia, quando è a rischio la vita della donna o quando la gravidanza è la conseguenza di uno stupro.
 La proposta di Cavalcante nega tuttavia anche l'attenuante dello stupro se passata la 22ma settimana producendo il paradosso che la donna che decide l'interruzione della gravidanza rischia una condanna molto maggiore a quella dello stupratore.

author: pedrojordao
title: Cher publica foto sensual com namorado 40 anos mais novo
text:
Cher publica foto sensual com namorado 40 anos mais novo
Cantora aparece sentada no colo do produtor musical Alexander Edwards
A cantora e diva pop Cher, de 77 anos, publicou nas redes sociais uma foto sensual com seu atual namorado, o produtor musical Alexander Edwards, de 38 anos.
Na imagem publicada no X (antigo Twitter), a cantora aparece sentada no colo de AE, como ele também é conhecido. “Amor é amor”, escreveu na legenda.
Além disso, a foto foi bastante editada para que só os dois apareçam, deixando a imagem com um fundo branco, sem que haja a possibilidade do internauta identificar onde eles estão.
A foto foi publicada no sábado (6). Na tarde deste domingo (7), a publicação já tinha mais de 16.000 curtidas e 2.000 compartilhamentos.
Cher e AE se conheceram no final de 2022 durante o Paris Fashion Week. Depois, quando ele conseguiu o telefone dela, se aproximaram e começaram a namorar.
Em maio do ano passado, tiveram um pequeno rompimento, mas logo retomaram o relacionamento.
Em
entrevista à Vanity Fair no final de 2023, a cantora disse não se surpreender com o fascínio e a curiosidade das pessoas sobre sua vida amorosa.
AE tem “dentes de diamante, tatuagens, cabelos brancos e é muito mais jovem (…) Ele é um homem lindo”, comentou.
Cher é conhecida pelo seu pioneirismo e independência em várias áreas da sua vida.
Ela é considerada a
única artista solo a conquistar o topo das paradas de sucesso da Billboard com suas músicas por sete décadas seguidas.
No final de 2023, ela lançou um álbum natalino e fez
sucesso mais uma vez com o single “DJ Play a Christmas Song”.
Love is Love
[pic.twitter.com/WE7PCpiezZ]
— Cher (@cher)
[January 6, 2024]
